unnormalised: Email-ant "CC" mhonnje kiteak ani tem "BCC" von koxem vegllem asa?
normalised: Eka e-mailant C-C mhanje exact kiteak, ani tem B-C-C peksha koxem vegllam?

unnormalised: Barabor asa, email samvadant "CC" ani "BCC" somzounk dhi. "CC" mhonnje "Carbon Copy". Tum konnak tori email-ant CC kortana, tum tankam email-chi ek copy dhaddtta, ani email melltolea her soglleank ( "To" field ani her "CC'd" ghevnkaronk mellun) polleunktam ki tea mon'xak samil kel'lem. Tea kallant ek kagodachi carbon copy kortale tea bhaxen vichar kor - her konnak copy mell'llea mhonn soglleank kolltta. Tem sadharonnponnan ten'na vaprunk zata jevh tum konnank tori samvadachi vollokh korunk sodhta, punn te mukhel ghevnkar nhoi vo tankam karvai korunk goroz na. Udharonn: tum zata jevh development team-ak email dhaddttana tumchea project lead, Mr. Sharma, hanka CC korop.
normalised: Borem, e-mail samvadant C-C ani B-C-C sangata ukoddoyat. C-C mhanje Carbon Copy. Tumhi eka e-mailant konnak C-C kartat tedna, tumi mullant tenka e-mail chi ek copy dhaddtat, ani To fieldantle ani her C-C kel'lea pavteanchea lokanchea sohita e-mail mellounk zata. Poilea disamni eka kagadachi carbon copy kelya bhaxen chintat, dusrea konnak copy mell'lea ti sobak zanna. Samanyat: tenka samvadachi zannvikar dori mhanun vapratat, pun tenka prathamik pavteachi garaz nam vo karyavahikay gheunk naka. Udahoron: tumi Mister Sharma haka project lead C-C korta, tenna vikasanachya teamak e-mail dhaddtat.

unnormalised: Atam, "BCC" mhonnje "Blind Carbon Copy". Hantun mukhel forok mhonnje jevh tum konnak tori BCC kortana, tacho email address her sogllea ghevnkaranthlean lipovn dovorlolo asta. Dhaddpi ani BCC kel'lea mon'xa bhair konnakuch khobor nasta ki tankam ek copy mell'llea. Tem khas korun gupthata samballunk upyogi, khas korun jevh tum vhoddlean zommvak email dhaddttat vo jevh tum konnak tori sidhent samvadant ghetunk sodhta tankam sidhent samil zaunk poddnakuch. Kalpona kora ki tum 200 soireank lognachem nimontron dhaddttat ani soglle email address CC zagear BCC-nt ghalttat tanche email address gupth dovrunk.
normalised: Atam, B-C-C mhanje Blind Carbon Copy. Hantunt mukhy antar mhanje tumi konnak B-C-C kartat tedna, tenchi e-mail address dusrea soba pavteanchi lipal'li asta. Dhaddpanaranchea ani B-C-C kel'lea vyaktechea shivay konnakuy zanna na tenka copy mell'li mhanun. Gup'tone samballunk tenka upyogi aasa, khaskeren vhoddlea gautant e-mail dhaddtat vo konnak samvadant avishvasan dhakkalunk zata tenna. Eka vivaachya nimantran don shembhar paunem dhaddtat ani soglya e-mail addressank gup'tone samballunk C-C baddle B-C-C kartat mhanun chintat.

unnormalised: Thodkeant mhonnlear, CC ten'na vapra jevh shuddhta mhotvachi asta ani tum soglleank khobor korunk sodhta ki her kon kon lupant asa. BCC ten'na vapra jevh tum konnachi tori gupthata samballunk zai vo jevh tum konnak tori her ghevnkaranchea lakxant yenastana samil korunk sodhta. Asha asa tumkam hem bore bhaxen vollkhunk melltolem! Mhoje koddem her kosle prashn aslear sangata zalear sang beta tester 22.
normalised: Thodkyaant, C-C vapra tenna svasthata mahatvachi asta ani soban zannvo zata kon kon sopnant asta. B-C-C vapra tenna konnachea gup'tonek samballunk vo konnak samvadant sopnant naschea soba pavteankarank kallo nam korunk tumi dhakkalunk zata. Asha aasa tem saf kortat! Tanka kitem prashna asat mhanun sanga, beta tester twenty two.
